reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan stylish, with one noting it looks great on slim girls, and appreciate its good construction, soft feel, and nice fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, warm and stylish!
items.body: This is a super stylish and soft sweater coat! I ordered the pink sweater and am super happy with the color! Today was the first day it was cold enough to wear as it is a heavy weight sweater. Wore it to church with a super cute pair of boots. Received many compliments upon my first day of wearing it. You can definitely dress this sweater up with some nice pants or go more casual with some jeans. Very versatile! I am 5’ 3” and weigh 130 lbs. My normal size these days is usually a medium depending on fit (if loose fit, I almost always go with small). I opted to go with the small when I ordered this sweater and I am glad I did! It fits perfectly! Good quality and love the pockets! I waited and bought this sweater when the price was reduced. Great buy!! Read more
items.author: Deb P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Comfortable, and Perfect for Layering
items.body: This open front cardigan combines a polished look with everyday comfort. The material feels soft, midweight, and breathable, making it suitable for year-round wear — light enough for spring and fall, yet warm enough to layer during cooler months. The lapel collar drapes beautifully, giving it a structured, tailored appearance without feeling stiff. It hangs nicely and adds just enough sophistication to elevate a casual outfit. I’ve paired it with jeans, slacks, and even a midi dress, and it works effortlessly in all settings — office, travel, or weekend wear. The stitching and seams are clean, with no loose threads or uneven hems. The open front design lays flat and doesn’t roll at the edges, which speaks to good construction. Sizing runs true, and the sleeves have enough give for layering over blouses or light sweaters without feeling tight. After multiple washes, it maintained its shape and color with no pilling or stretching, which is impressive for a garment at this price point. Overall, this cardigan is a reliable wardrobe staple — simple, stylish, and well-made. It’s ideal for anyone looking for a versatile layering piece that can move seamlessly from professional to casual wear. Read more
items.author: rane koehler

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater –
items.body: I love this sweater — it's absolutely beautiful! The material is thick and feels high quality, yet it's not bulky or heavy to wear. My only small wish is that the buttons would actually close, but even without that, it still looks great and wears well. Perfect for layering in cooler weather. Read more
items.author: Jojo326

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase, good quality and easily versatile
items.body: I love this sweater. Its cute, comfortable and easily worn with skirts or pants. The color is as pictured and the fit is nice. I'm short and sometimes I swim in longer cut items but not this. The feel of the material is soft. I haven't washed it yet so I do not know how it will hold up. I think it will need care to keep its shape though. All in all I'm happy with the quality of this item. Read more
items.author: B Quail

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable sweater I own
items.body: Love it so much I immediately ordered another color. This is a great office sweater: thick, soft, and stylish. The small fits me perfectly (5 ft., 130lbs). Note: there is no closure, the buttons are decorative only. I prefer to wear it with the lapel folded back. Although not necessary, I secure lapels down with safety pins from inside - that way I can adjust how large I want the lapel. Purchased in dark grey and it looks fabulous. Waiting on the green color. Read more
items.author: TF

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrong color
items.body: I ordered the beige (which looks more like a cream color). It is a light yellow color. Otherwise, the item is soft and looks nice. However, since it isn’t the color I wanted, I’ll be returning it. Read more
items.author: Re Co

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, versatile and machine washable and dry-able! Win!
items.body: I am 5'4"; 145 lbs and typically am a size 6. I ordered two sizes: a Small and a Medium and kept them both because they both fit! The small, as predicted, was a little more fitted, the sleeve length hits right at the wrist, sweater length hits right around mid-hip. The weight of the material is really nice, heavy but not bulky. I've received compliments on both sweaters and they have served me well for work, church, and for a slightly more upscale jacket for going out to dinner. The medium (on me) fit slightly baggier in the arms and torso, though I don't mind. It doesn't look ill-proportioned, just a more relaxed fit. I have machine washed and dried both multiple times and they hold up well. The red wine color skews more on the warm side than the cool side (slightly more orange undertones than blue undertones). The navy blue is exactly that: navy blue. I did also try the beige color but I returned it because it looked a little more pink than I was going for. Would definitely order more! Read more
items.author: MOMoM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality. I sized down. Go by the shoulder width you like.
items.body: Love love love. It’s good quality. Not to thin, just right. I like large sizes but ended up getting the small! The red was a nice light brick color if that makes sense, nutmeg like (?) anyhow, this is how I solve the fact that I wear them then same black dress all summer and same black top and jeans in the winter. FIGURE OUT WHAT SHOULDER SEAM you need and that’ll help you w the size. I would like this in every color, it’s a good staple. Perfect length, didn’t wrinkle excessively, nice weight- meaning it’s good quality. For me, this was a real hit. (I might buy more bc I end up leaving things like this behind) and I’d like to eventually not need to buy anything else. I really would like to to have my favorites locked down. Read more
items.author: Placeholder

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Gray, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Blue, Army Green, Black, Dark Gray, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
